-->|network=|runtime=|viewership=|producer=|director=|award3_type=|alt2=|image2size=|caption2=|precedence_label=|individual=|higher=|same=|lower=|related=|previous=|main=Lambda Literary Award|award3_winner=|award4_type=|image2=|award2_type=|preshow_host=|image_size=|alt=|caption=|awarded_for=LGBT Erotica|sponsor=Lambda Literary Foundation|date=Annual|location=|country=|presenter=|former name=|host=|subheader=|acts=|reward=|year=|year2=|holder_label=|holder=|most_awards=|most_nominations=|award1_type=|award1_winner=|image=|next=}}The Lambda Literary Award for LGBTQ+ Romance & Erotica is an annual literary award established in 2002 and presented by the Lambda Literary Foundation that awards books with LGBTQ+ characters and "whose content is principally of an erotic nature." "Anthologies, novels, novellas, graphic novels, memoirs, and short story collections" are eligible for the award.
The award has been presented in the following categories: Gay Erotica, Lesbian Erotica, and LGBTQ+ Erotica.
